posts.name: Christopher Ely
posts.cooked:
We are attempting to use the new Swerve Generator in the Phoenix 6 Beta. We have configured all of the modules, and are attempting to run the verification tests. The steering verification test was successful, but the drive verification returned an error:

The configs read from the device do not match the configs that were written.

We ran a factory reset on all devices, yet the error persisted. We are using SDS Mk4i swerve modules. The firmware is up to date on everything.

posts.name: Christopher Ely
posts.cooked: Anyone have any ideas? Hoping to get an answer soon as tonight is our last preseason meeting.

posts.name: Clayton Yocom
posts.cooked:
Have you tried reaching out directly to ctre?

I highly recommend calling them before 5pm EST if this is an issue you want to solve right now.

posts.name: Izzy Haladjian
posts.cooked: We are seeing the same error, were you able to find a solution?

posts.name: Dalton Smith
posts.cooked: This was a bug in beta 4. Update your vendordep to beta 5.

posts.name: Christopher Ely
posts.cooked: Thanks!. We checked for updates, but didnâ€™t see any at the time. Weâ€™ll check again.

posts.name: system
posts.cooked: This topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
